content: what is the current state of async functions in jco host implementations? Any plans in that direction or is tht an "after wasip3" thing?

This is a mix of a preview 3 thing and also outstanding work that can be done within a preview 2 context. @Calvin Prewitt has been exploring some ideas here for preview 2, including exploring asyncify and workfer workflows, we are also simultaneously discussing the path to preview 3 in Jco as well. If you're interested in joining the discussion please do say so. It's a combination of issues and meeting discussions within the bi-weekly Jco meetings about this.
